title: Continue blending of 4 per cent imported coal till October 15, government tells power plants
description: Efficiently managing coal blending requirements and supply logistics is crucial for meeting peak power demand. Maintaining a balance between coal receipt and consumption at domestic coal-based plants is essential for uninterrupted power generation across the country.
content: (You can now subscribe to our Economic Times WhatsApp channel)
